Spring.Persistence.Criteria.Interfaces Namespace

Summary

Represents namespace Spring.Persistence.Criteria.Interfaces.

Interfaces
 NameDescription
ICriteria<T>

ICriteria<T> is a simplified API for retrieving entities by composing ICriterion objects. This is a very convenient approach for functionality like "search" screens where there is a variable number of conditions to be placed upon the result set. The Spring.Persistence.Core.Session|TSession is a factory for ICriteria<T> . ICriterion instances are usually obtained via the factory methods on Spring.Persistence.Criteria.Restrictions|Restrictions .

ICriterion

An object-oriented representation of a query criterion that may be used as a restriction in a ICriteria<T> query. Built-in criterion types are provided by the Spring.Persistence.Criteria.Restrictions|Restrictions factory class. This interface might be implemented by application classes that define custom restriction criteria.

IDBPage<T>

Represents paged fetches.

IJunction

Represents type IJunction.

IOrderBy

Represents an ordering imposed upon a ICriteria<T> result set.

IProperty

A factory for property specific criterion and projection instances.
